page.title: 20Religion Today
page.content: There are 8 places of worship within our block. Of the 3 Anglican churches one, at{Shoscombe}is used as a school during weekdays with the chancel unscreened during worship. Being deep in the territory of{John Wesley}there are 4 nonconformist chapels still in use, many of the small village chapels are now disused. The chapel at {Camerton}is on the site of one of the first Wesleyan chapels. There is a Roman Catholic church and a Christodelphian hall both situated at {Peasedown.}Generally weekly congregation numbers have fallen although churches are still full at religious festivals and constantly used for family occasions, being considered an integral part of {community life}today.
